{"id":886041390,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1674791550,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/886041390/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = s.length()-1;\n        while(left < right)\n        {\n            while(!alpha(s.charAt(left)))\n                left++;\n            while(!alpha(s.charAt(right)))\n                right--;\n            if (left >= right)\n                return true;\n            if(s.charAt(left) == s.charAt(right) || Math.abs(s.charAt(left) - s.charAt(right)) == 'a' - 'A')\n            {\n                left++;\n                right--;\n            }\n            else \n            {\n                // System.out.println(left + \" \" + right);\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    private boolean alpha(char let)\n    {\n        return(('A' <= let && let <= 'Z') || ('a' <= let && 'z' >= let));\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
